DiscountTypes.label: Simple
DiscountTypes.description: A basic discount that applies a fixed amount or percentage off the total price.

DiscountTypes.label: Contains
DiscountTypes.description: A discount that applies when a specific item is present in the cart above a certain quantity, can also be applied based on categories.

DiscountTypes.label: Category
DiscountTypes.description: A discount that applies to all items in a specific category.

DiscountTypes.label: Greater Than
DiscountTypes.description: A discount that applies when the total price exceeds a specified amount, or if the products of some category exceed a certain amount. Note that on categories this discount is calculated off the base price.

DiscountTypes.label: Max
DiscountTypes.description: A discount that applies the maximum discount between two discounts.

DiscountTypes.label: And
DiscountTypes.description: A discount that applies when both the conditions are met.

DiscountTypes.label: Xor
DiscountTypes.description: A discount that applies when exactly one of the conditions is met. If both conditions are met, then preference of cheaper/ more expensive discount can be set.

DiscountTypes.label: Or
DiscountTypes.description: A discount that applies when at least one of the conditions is met. If both conditions are met, then preference of cheaper/ more expensive discount can be set.
